resources.string:
You will be an owner of your very own pet! 

 Don't worry. They can take care of themselves, but they can not seem to grow! 

 That is where you come in. These pets are hungry for inspiration and energy. 

 Perhaps you could be the inspiration they need!
%1$s is ready to level up!\n\n%1$s can level up twice if you exercise alongside them!
Item is locked!\nEvolve your pet to see what it is.
Tap on an item to view its description.

%1$s seems to have taken a liking for this apple. They love to roll this fruit around, knocking anything in its way. They once tried asking you to play fetch with it. …Well, let\'s say it ended up in a mess.

A UFO you bought for %1$s. The UFO\'s original color was gray, but they painted it to match to their liking. They stared at this UFO for a long time while you two were walking down the street. You remembered seeing a tear in their eye…
A spooky doll %1$s has sewn for you. The doll resembles closely to them. You feel uneasy holding it, but you appreciate the thought.
A fluffy pillow. Simple, but %1$s loves it, especially when the pillow is cold. Good thing %1$s is a raincloud, huh?

%1$s has gotten worried that they have been overly emotional about everything, that they bought you an umbrella for you to shield yourself from their tears. You didn\'t mind, but %1$s insisted that you take it.
%1$s has been so happy nowadays that they shed tears. One tear stood out from the rest. Seems that %1$s does not mind you taking it.
You\'re not entirely sure what this is. %1$s says they use this as a mask on Halloween, but if they\'re already a paper bag… Best not to wonder.
%1$s\'s nightlight. They can\'t sleep without it at night after that one time they shook you awake in the middle of the night.
A soda can from %1$s\'s collection of soda collection. It\'s priceless as it apparently was bought over 20 years ago! How time flies…
